Trade/Device Name(s): BioPlex® 2200 Rubella and CMV IgM Kit
BioPlex® 2200 Rubella and CMV IgM Calibrator Set
BioPlex® 2200 Rubella and CMV IgM Control Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bio-Rad BioPlex 2200 Rubella and CMV IgM kit for multiplex detection of IgM antibodies to Rubella and CMV in serum and plasma using a multiplex flow immunoassay
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the qualitative detection of IgM antibodies to Rubella and CMV in human serum and potassium EDTA or sodium heparin plasma, as an aid in diagnosis of current or recent infection in suspected individuals including women of child-bearing age, not for blood donor screening or point-of-care use.
